rules_text:
Blockbuster 5 [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap five untapped permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.)[/i]
Return all creatures and planeswalkers to their owner's hands. If this spell is a blockbuster, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards.
Exile Reset Protocol.
